description: The `ecom-catalog` custom extension SPI provides functionality for implementing your own catalog of items for sale.
> **Note:** This SPI is currently in beta and is subject to change. Some SPIs are currently not available to all users.

params.name: options
params.doc: Catalog and item references, weight unit, and quantities requested by Wix eCommerce.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - Catalog info and item data.

docs.summary: Retrieves item data from a custom catalog.
description: This function is automatically called by Wix eCommerce to retrieve the catalog items provided by your integration.
This happens when certain actions are performed on the cart and/or checkout. For example, when an item is added to the cart.

examples.title: Example of returned fields for `catalogItems` array
body: "original": "Professional Travelers RV for road trips, Enjoy a comfortable mobile home for the best family experience !",
"translated": "Professional Travelers RV for road trips, Enjoy a comfortable mobile home for the best family experience !"
"original": "Professional Travelers RV for road trips, Enjoy a comfortable mobile home for the best family experience !",
"translated": "Professional Travelers RV for road trips, Enjoy a comfortable mobile home for the best family experience !"

members.name: id
members.doc: Catalog item ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Catalog item name.

members.name: image
members.doc:
Line item image. We only support images coming from Wix media manager, if you want to use an image from another source you must first upload it to Wix media manager.
Example URL: `"https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5cc69183e7954e2c9760fa2383870992.jpg"`.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the item is in stock.

members.name: deploymentUri
members.doc: The URL of the SPI implementation.

members.name: allItemsDiscount
members.doc: Configuration for discount of all items in the catalog.

members.name: specificItemsDiscount
members.doc: Configuration for discount of specific items in the catalog.

members.name: catalogReferences
members.doc: Catalog and item reference.

members.name: data
members.doc: Item data.

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within the custom catalog.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the catalog app.

members.name: options
members.doc:
Additional info in key:value form. For example, a size medium red t-shirt's `options` field would hold something like this:
+ {"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: Catalog and items reference info.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Item quantity.

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line color name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Description line color name translated into buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: code
members.doc: HEX or RGB color code for display.

members.name: name
members.doc: Description line name.

members.name: plainText
members.doc: Description line plain text value.

members.name: colorInfo
members.doc: Description line color value.

members.name: enabled
members.doc: Whether the discount is enabled.

members.name: translationKey
members.doc: Translation key for display purposes.

members.name: productName
members.doc: **Required** - Item name.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: **Required** - Item type.

members.name: price
members.doc: **Required** - Item price **after** catalog-defined discount.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: url
members.doc:
URL to the item's page on the site.
When not provided, the link back from the cart page to the relevant item page will not work.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc:
Line item description lines.
Line item description lines. Used for displaying the cart, checkout and order.
For example, if you want `Size: Large` to appear under the item name, create a description line with `{"name": {"original": "Size"}}` and  `{"plainText": {"original": "Large"}}`.

members.name: media
members.doc:
Line item image. We only support images coming from Wix media manager, if you want to use an image from another source you must first upload it to Wix media manager.
Example URL: `"wix:image://v1/11062b_7fba2fc327a04e1493f1a28213e8cae8~mv2.jpeg/camping-site#originWidth=6924&originHeight=3130"`.

members.name: quantityAvailable
members.doc:
Item quantity available for purchase.
Only return this if inventory is managed. Not returning this field means that the buyer can "infinitely" tick up the number of items in the cart.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU and item weight.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `"FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE"`. One of:
+ `"FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE"` - Entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `"FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE"` - Entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
+ `"MEMBERSHIP"` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is `0`.
+ `"DEPOSIT_ONLINE"` - Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout. Amount to be paid is defined by `depositAmount` field.

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc:
Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout.
Eligible for items with `paymentOption` type `"DEPOSIT_ONLINE"` only. If omitted - item's price will not be split and is expected to be paid in single installment.

members.name: serviceProperties
members.doc:
Service properties.
When relevant, contains information such as service date and number of participants. Used, among other things, when checking for valid memberships.

members.name: rootCatalogItemId
members.doc:
In cases where `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is NOT the actual catalog item ID, this field will return the true item's ID.
+ For example, for Wix Bookings, `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is the booking ID. Therefore this value is set to the service ID.
+ In most cases, this field is the name as `catalogReference.catalogItemId`.
+ Used in membership validation.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc:
Additional price description.
For example, "Starts at $67".

members.name: preset
members.doc:
Preset item type. One of:
+ `"PHYSICAL"`
+ `"DIGITAL"`
+ `"GIFT_CARD"`
+ `"SERVICE"`

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Whether the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: original
members.doc: Name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Name translated into to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: catalogReferences
members.doc: Catalog and items reference info and quantities.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc:
Weight measurement unit. Defaults to site weight unit. One of:
+ `"KG"` (kilograms)
+ `"LB"` (pounds)

members.name: original
members.doc: Text in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Text translated into buyer's language. Defaults to `original` when not defined.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to return.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Item weight.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock keeping unit. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this item is shippable.

members.name: catalogItems
members.doc: Catalog item info.

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: scheduledDate
members.doc: Date and time the service is to be provided. For example, the time of the yoga class.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc:
Number of people participating in this service.
For example, the number of people attending the yoga class or the number of people per hotel room.

members.name: relativePath
members.doc: Path to the item page. For example, `"/product-page/a-product"`.

members.name: url
members.doc: URL of item page. For example, `"https://mysite.com/product-page/a-product"`. Defaults to site home page.
